message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $140. It's in great condition and worth a lot to you. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $135 feels more fair to me considering the value of this product. Let's split the difference.
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can only go up to $130. Can you meet me at that price?
